summary: "I Saw the TV Glow" is a 2024 American horror drama film directed by Jane Schoenbrun. It tells the story of two high school students, played by Justice Smith and Brigette Lundy-Paine, who become obsessed with their favorite TV show, causing them to doubt their reality and selves. The movie also features stars like Helena Howard and Emma Stone, who helped produce it. It premiered at Sundance in January 2024 and was released in theaters in May. It's part of Schoenbrun's "Screen Trilogy," with the previous film being "We're All Going to the World's Fair."
title: I Saw the TV Glow
